channel.title: References on Pen programming language
channel.description: Recent content in References on Pen programming language

item.title: Command line tools
item.description: Command line tools The pen command has the following sub-commands. For more information, see help by running pen --help. create command It creates a package of a given kind in a specified directory. Creating an application package pen init foo Creating a library package pen init --library foo build command It builds a package in a current directory. pen build
